backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated file paths, components, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains humanâ€‘written summaries of all frontend files and their roles in the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom OKLCH theme tokens for light and dark mode with global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point enabling dark mode by default with fixed background, fonts, favicon, and script mount point.
frontend/postcss.config.cjs: PostCSS configuration enabling Tailwind and Autoprefixer plugins.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main SPA component rendering header, hero, navigable sections, menu categories, and business info.
frontend/src/components/LocationMapPrevi: Map preview component with Google Maps iframe and fallback card when loading fails.
frontend/src/components/MenuCategoryGrid: Renders a category card with title and grid of MenuItemCard components.
frontend/src/components/MenuItemCard.tsx: Renders a menu item card with dynamic price variants and WhatsApp ordering, including variant selection through a dialog.
frontend/src/components/RevealableSectio: Displays a section only when marked revealed, wrapping content in a Section component.
frontend/src/components/SafeImage.tsx: Image component that swaps to a fallback source on load error and resets when the input source changes.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Generic page section wrapper applying layout padding and themed background classes.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Fixed top navigation header with logo and buttons that trigger section navigation.
frontend/src/content/business.ts: Central business configuration defining branding, social links, hours, contact info, and menu data with image helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query backend hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealableSections: Manages which site section is active and revealed, providing scroll behavior after activation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining colors, components, and scrollbar-hiding rules.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Provides functions to derive menu item variant options and build a WhatsApp deep link with a prefilled order message.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with extended theme settings, plugins, colors, animations, and container options.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for the website build.
